es.ucm.fdi.tp.practica6.net

Class NetGameController

  • java.lang.Object
    • es.ucm.fdi.tp.basecode.bgame.control.Controller
      • es.ucm.fdi.tp.practica6.net.NetGameController
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    GameClient, GameServer

    public abstract class NetGameController
extends Controller
    A new controller for the net-mode game. Includes methods to perform the actions needed by chat commands
    Author:
    David Fdez Alcoba, Manuel Sanchez Torron

    • Method Detail

      • showPlayers

        public abstract void showPlayers(Piece p)
        Shows the currently connected players in the "p" view.
        Parameters:
        p - Represents the player that wants to see the players' list

      • handleTextEntry

        public abstract void handleTextEntry(Piece p,
                   java.lang.String text)
        Dictates what to do when a chat message is sent.
        Parameters:
        p - The piece who sends the message
        text - The message itself.

      • showHelp

        public abstract void showHelp()
        Displays a list of the possible commands. This method should only be used by a client.
